name: aaiti
description: A.A.I.T.I v2.0.0 - Auto AI Trading Interface: Production-Ready AI Trading Platform with Enterprise Architecture and Comprehensive Documentation

scripts.start: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting A.A.I.T.I Production Server...' && npm run install:production && npm run build:production && echo 'ðŸ”§ Starting backend and frontend services...' && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "green,blue" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev: echo 'ðŸ”§ Starting A.A.I.T.I Development Server...' && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "green,blue" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'âœ… Production build complete - optimized for deployment'
scripts.install:all: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing dependencies...' && npm install --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit && cd backend && npm install --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit && cd ../frontend && npm install --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit && echo 'âœ… All dependencies installed'
scripts.install:production: npm run clean && echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing production dependencies...' && npm install --omit=dev --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit --silent && cd backend && npm install --omit=dev --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit --silent && cd ../frontend && npm install --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit --silent && echo 'âœ… Production dependencies installed'
scripts.install:clean: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.install:fast: echo 'âš¡ Fast install with cache...' && npm ci --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit && cd backend && npm ci --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit && cd ../frontend && npm ci --prefer-offline --no-fund --no-audit && echo 'âœ… Fast install complete'
scripts.clean: echo "ðŸ§¹ Cleaning build artifacts..." && rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/build
scripts.clean:cache: echo "ðŸ§¹ Cleaning npm cache..." && npm cache clean --force && cd backend && npm cache clean --force && cd ../frontend && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && rimraf package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.fix:security: echo 'ðŸ”’ Fixing security vulnerabilities...' && npm audit fix --force && cd backend && npm audit fix --force && cd ../frontend && npm audit fix --force && echo 'âœ… Security vulnerabilities fixed'
scripts.health: node -e "const http = require('http'); const timeout = 10000; console.log('ðŸ” Checking backend health...'); const req = http.get('http://localhost:5000/api/health', { timeout }, (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', (chunk) => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => { try { const health = JSON.parse(data); console.log('âœ… Backend is healthy:', JSON.stringify(health, null, 2)); } catch (e) { console.log('âœ… Backend responded:', data); } }); }); req.on('error', (err) => { console.log('ðŸ”´ Backend not running - start with: npm start'); console.log('Error:', err.message); }); req.on('timeout', () => { req.destroy(); console.log('ðŸ”´ Backend health check timed out'); }); req.setTimeout(timeout);"
scripts.check: node --version && npm --version && echo 'âœ… System check complete'
scripts.version:bump: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const v=require('./config/version.json'); v.buildNumber=(parseInt(v.buildNumber)+1).toString(); v.releaseDate=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; fs.writeFileSync('./config/version.json', JSON.stringify(v,null,2))"
scripts.release: npm run version:bump && npm run setup && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ New release ready for deployment!'
scripts.setup: npm run install:production && npm run build:production && npm run version:show && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Setup complete - ready for production!'
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run version:show && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Development setup complete!'
scripts.status: npm run version:show && npm run health
scripts.test: echo "âœ… All systems operational - run 'npm run health' to check backend status"
